articles.author: Joe Coles
articles.title: BYU’s Courtney Wayment wins 5000m at NCAA indoor track and field championships - Deseret News
articles.description: With a time of 15:30.17, BYU’s Courtney Wayment won the national championship in the women’s 5,000-meter race at the NCAA indoor track and field championships in Birmingham, Alabama, on Friday night.
articles.content:
BYU track and field athlete Courtney Wayment is now a three-time national champion.
